mapper.select: select d.orddetail_id, d.item_code, i.item_name, d.ord_count, d.orddet_status, o.ord_date, d.out_date, o.customer_id, c.customer_name, e.emp_name, d.ord_count - sum(nvl(r.fn_rel_count, 0)) remain from orders o join customer c on(o.customer_id = c.customer_id) join orddetail d on(o.ord_id = d.ord_id) join itemlist i on(d.item_code = i.item_code) full outer join release r on(d.orddetail_id = r.orddetail_id) join emp e on(o.emp_no = e.emp_no) where (d.orddet_status = '접수완료' or d.orddet_status ='부분출고') and i.item_name = #{itemName} group by d.orddetail_id, d.item_code, i.item_name, d.ord_count, d.orddet_status, o.ord_date, d.out_date, o.customer_id, c.customer_name,e.emp_name

select distinct r.fn_release_id, r.orddetail_id, i.item_name, r.fn_rel_count, d.ord_count, e.emp_name, r.remain from release r join orddetail d on(r.orddetail_id = d.orddetail_id) join itemlist i on(d.item_code = i.item_code) join emp e on(r.emp_no = e.emp_no) where d.orddet_status = '출고완료' or d.orddet_status = '부분출고'
select item_code, item_name from itemlist where item_name like '%' || #{itemName} || '%' and item_type = 'FIN'
select customer_id, customer_name from customer where customer_name like '%' || #{customerName} || '%' and cust_part = 'SEL'
